change.changenote: Section 38 (4) BEFORE amended by 2023-10-97, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Despite subsection (3), if a notice of reconsideration is deficient, the commissioner may in his or her discretion allow a reasonable period of time within which the notice of reconsideration may be perfected.

change.changenote: Section 42 (2) BEFORE amended by 2023-10-98, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person must not hold himself or herself out to be

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a trucker authorized to carry out container trucking services to or on behalf of a licensee

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: unless the person is a licensee or trucker authorized to carry out container trucking services to or on behalf of a licensee.
